SEARCH
Package helper

Class DataHandler

java.lang.Object
helper.DataHandler
public class DataHandler extends Object
Responsible for reading files from data/ into the program state. Also writes program state back into the files for persistence.

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      public static List<User> getUsers()
      Reads both student_list and staff_list CSVs
      Builds the appropriate objects (Student/Staff)
      Returns:
      List of all User objects described in the CSVs.

    • getCamps

      public static List<Camp> getCamps()
      Reads data/camps.csv
      Builds Camp objects described in camps.csv
      Returns:
      List of all Camp objects described in the CSV.

    • getSignups

      public static List<Signup> getSignups(List<User> userList, List<Camp> campList)
      Reads data/signups.csv
      Builds Signup objects described in signups.csv
      Parameters:
      userList - List of all Users
      campList - List of all Camps
      Returns:
      List of all Signup objects described in the CSV.

    • getEnquiries

      public static List<Enquiry> getEnquiries(List<User> userList, List<Camp> campList)
      Read data/enquiries.csv
      Constructs all enquiries and adds to the master list.
      This .csv has "|" instead of commas to allow for commas in the descriptions
      Newlines in the .csv have been substituted with 胡 with very low chance of collision
      Parameters:
      userList - List of all User objects. Required to pull the correct user to construct the Enquiry.
      campList - List of all Camp objects. Required to pull the correct camp to construct the Enquiry.
      Returns:
      List of all Enquiry objects.

    • getSuggestions

      public static List<Suggestion> getSuggestions(List<User> userList, List<Camp> campList)
      Read data/suggestions.csv
      Constructs all Suggestions and adds to the master list.
      This .csv has "|" instead of commas to allow for commas in the descriptions
      Newlines in the .csv have been substituted with 胡 with very low chance of collision
      Parameters:
      userList - List of all User objects. Required to pull the correct user to construct the Suggestion.
      campList - List of all Camp objects. Required to pull the correct camp to construct the Suggestion.
      Returns:
      List of all Suggestion objects.

    • saveUsers

      public static void saveUsers(List<User> userList)
      Writes the current state of all User objects into their respective CSVs.
      Parameters:
      userList - List of all User objects

    • saveCamps

      public static void saveCamps(List<Camp> campList)
      Writes the current state of all Camp objects into their respective CSVs.
      Parameters:
      campList - List of all Camps

    • saveSignups

      public static void saveSignups(List<Signup> signupList)
      Saves all student-camp attendee relationships to csv.
      Called whenever Signups are edited.
      Parameters:
      signupList - List of all Signup objects.

    • saveEnquiries

      public static void saveEnquiries(List<Enquiry> enquiryList)
      Saves the state of all Enquiry objects to csv.
      Called whenever Enquiries are edited.
      Parameters:
      enquiryList - List of all Signup objects.

    • saveSuggestions

      public static void saveSuggestions(List<Suggestion> suggestionsList)
      Saves the state of all Suggestion objects to csv.
      Called whenever Suggestions are edited.
      Parameters:
      suggestionsList - List of all Signup objects.

    • getIDFromEmail

      private static String getIDFromEmail(String email)
      Returns the correct format for userID from the .csv CSVs have emails instead of userID as per format.
      Parameters:
      email - Email string as found in datafile
      Returns:
      Preceding string before the "@" symbol.
